Nenhum evento encontrado
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {HttpClient} from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'] }) export class EventosComponent implements OnInit { eventos: any; constructor( private http: HttpClient ) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getEventos(); } getEventos(): void { this.http.get('https://localhost:5001/api/eventos').subscribe(response => this.eventos = response, error => console.log(error)); } }
